title: RecipeProcess
description: Specifies the process part of a recipe for use in planning from recipe.

name.description: An informal or formal textual identifier for the item. Does not imply uniqueness.

hasDuration.description: The planned calendar duration of the process as defined for the recipe batch.

processConformsTo.description: The standard specification or definition of a process.

processClassifiedAs.description: References a concept in a common taxonomy or other classification scheme for purposes of categorization.
